OrderItemRelationship.name: OrderItemRelationship
OrderItemRelationship.description: Describes a relationship between order products.

AssociatedOrderItemId.description: The unique identifier of the associated order product.

AssociatedOrderItemInventory.description: A static enum that describes the associated order item inventory in the OrderItemSummaryRelationship.

AssociatedOrderItemPricing.description: Indicates how the associated order product is priced relative to the main order product. The value is informative; the system doesn’t check whether the associated order product is included in the bundle price.

AssociatedOrderItemRole.description: Describes the position of the associated order product in the relationship.

AssociatedQuantScaleMethod.description: How the quantity of the associated order product scales, relative to the main order product. The value is informative; the system doesn’t check whether the scaled quantities are correct.

MainOrderItemId.description: The main order product’s unique identifier.

MainOrderItemRole.description: Indicates the role of the main order product in the relationship.

Name.description: The name of the order product relationship.

OrderId.description: The unique identifier of the related order.

ProductRelationshipTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the record that describes the relationship between the main and associated order products.
